meanings.sent1: She refiles the papers to keep them organized.
meanings.sent2: He always refiles his documents after using them.
meanings.sent3: The office clerk refiles the papers with a smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mind refiles memories like a well-organized cabinet.
meanings.sent5: The librarian refiles the books with precision and care.

meanings.definition: To put in a different file.
meanings.sent1: He refiles the report in the correct folder.
meanings.sent2: She refiles the documents for easy access later.
meanings.sent3: The detective refiles the evidence to confuse the suspect.
meanings.sent4: His heart refiles emotions in separate compartments.
meanings.sent5: The student refiles the notes to study efficiently.

meanings.definition: To file again under a different heading.
meanings.sent1: The secretary refiles the forms under the new category.
meanings.sent2: They refiles the papers under the updated section.
meanings.sent3: The teacher refiles the assignments with creative labels.
meanings.sent4: His brain refiles thoughts into unique mental folders.
meanings.sent5: The archivist refiles the documents with attention to detail.
